alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 3:34PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm with gusty outflow winds will impact portions of south central Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm with gusty outflow winds 15 miles southwest of Wendover, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust will reduce visibility. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Clive, Utah Test and Training Range South and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If traveling, slow down if visibility is reduced. Crosswinds may cause difficult driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
